alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:48PM EDT until June 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Glascock County in east central Georgia... Northeastern Washington County in east central Georgia... Central Jefferson County in east central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 648 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Davisboro, or 10 miles west of Louisville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Louisville, Davisboro, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Downs, Grange and Stapletons Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
